metadata.title: CVE-2012-2398 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in files/ajax/download.php inownCloud before 3.0.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via the files parameter, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2012-2269.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
